title: LCS Stream Feedback
body:
Between the LCS replay-scenes within a game and the game itself on there is a bright white screen as a transitioning screen. This white screen is very bright and especially on later times of the day (for example american LCS games in Europe) can be harsh to the eyes. 
I just want to give you feedback, that this screen can simply be exchanged for a darker tansitioning screen (like black), that would be much more comfortable for the eyes.
